articles.author: KEVIN FREKING
articles.title: US homelessness hits its highest reported level - The Associated Press
articles.description: The United States has experienced a 12% increase in homelessness, to its highest reported level. Federal officials Friday said soaring rents and a winding down of coronavirus pandemic assistance combined to put housing out of reach for more Americans. Numbers…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The United States experienced a dramatic 12% increase in homelessness to its highest reported level as soaring rents and a decline in coronavirus pandemic assistance combined to put h… [+6098 chars]
